Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EmptyCellException
    Brief Exception thrown when the content of a Cell is empty
    IncorrectBlockTypeException
    Brief this exception is thrown when a player tries to build a Block of the incorrect type on a given Cell
    NoCardWithSuchIdException
    Brief Exception thrown when a card does not match a given id
    NoPlayerWithSuchColorException
    Brief Exception thrown when a player does not have workers of a certain color
    NoPlayerWithSuchIdException
    Brief Exception thrown when a player does not match a given id
    OutOfBoundsException
    Brief exception that signals that a coordinate in Position isn't in [0,4]
    PrintableRuntimeException
    Brief Abstract exception containing a printable message to print when it is thrown
    SamePositionException
    Brief Exception thrown when a worker is trying to be moved to the position where it was before
